Too many to choose from. Very diverse.
Its a great school for everyone no matter what your interest is. It is very diverse.
I don't know if this counts but you can always find parking.
Yes have have a little but of everything for everyone!

Camp, ride, fish, tube. Everything is so close. Oregon has everything its a great place to live! We can take an hour and go to a beach. go 20 mins to a river or lake to swim, kayak or fish. We have it all.
In the heart of the capital surrounded by everything. It has many options.
Never be afraid to ask questions.

I was worried that Chemeketa being as large and busy as it is I wouldn't get the assistance and guidance I needed. I was wrong they have been wonderful! Everyone is always willing to help and polite I love it!

textAfterTable: Linda from Salem, OR 05/11/2011 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 57 Categories Comments Bang for the buck Chemeketa offers a scholars program which pays for your tuition for your first 2 years if you maintain a GPA of 3.5 and higher. This has made Chemeketa grow more and more popular because of course, everyone wants to save money. Will enjoy being here One thing that separates Chemeketa from a university is the rate of people most of the time being much older than you. So in some classes it may feel like you are the only one your age. But that doesn't mean there aren't people whom you wouldn't get along with. Will learn a lot This school is of course, a community college. Unlike Universities, it offers everyone a chance to interact closer with a professor of counselor. The
